snippet: An imposing wall of corrugated steel disconnects main streets, businesses, shared histories and binational family ties along the Mexican border in Arizona.
abstract: Imposing wall of corrugated steel separates main streets, businesses, shared histories and bi-national family ties along the Mexican border in Arizona; presence of wall has caused businesses in Douglas, Ariz, to struggle or fail, particularly since the American government stopped issuing visas across the border in Agua Prieta, Mex in 2010.
lead_paragraph: An imposing wall of corrugated steel disconnects main streets, businesses, shared histories and binational family ties along the Mexican border in Arizona.

headline.main: Effort to Secure Border Crimps Commerce Along It
headline.print_headline: Effort to Secure Border Crimps Commerce Along It
